Package de.hu_berlin.german.korpling.saltnpepper.salt.saltCommon.sCorpusStructure

Interface Summary
SCorpus In Salt a corpus is represented by this class.
SCorpusDocumentRelation This type represents a hierarchical relation between a corpus (objects of type SCorpus) and a document (objects of type SDocument).
SCorpusGraph In Salt it is possible to create a treelike corpus structure to create hierarchies between corpora.
SCorpusRelation This type represents a hierarchical relation between two corpora (two objects of type SCorpus).
SCorpusStructureFactory The Factory for the model.
SCorpusStructurePackage The Package for the model.
SCorpusStructurePackage.Literals Defines literals for the meta objects that represent each class, each feature of each class, each enum, and each data type
SDocument In Salt a document is represented by this class.
